name: Gowowo Delivery Elementor
author: Gowowo

sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section.
  2. Search For “Gowowo Delivery Elementor”.
  3. Install, then Activate it.
  4. Follow the Documentation

Old Way:

  1. Upload gowowo-delivery-elementor.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the Documentation
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.

How config API SMS Twilio?

In dashboard Admin, Go to Cutomize Settings wp-admin/customize.php
sections.description:
WHY NEED TO CREATE A PAGE MENU FOR DELIVERY?

Gowowo Delivery Elementor Plugin for WordPress is a powerful and easy-to-use plugin designed to help you create a stunning website for your restaurant business. It comes with a modern and responsive design, multiple page layouts, and a variety of customization options. With this plugin, you can easily create a website that looks great on any device.

üöÄ Backed By A Trusted Team

This plugin is brought to you by the team TTH, a dedicated marketplace for WordPress, trusted by 2000+ happy users.

Feature:
– User-friendly ordering interface for customers

  • Content is built by the Widget Elementor

  • Efficient order management system for businesses

  • Customization options to reflect brand identity

  • Detailed reports and analytics for business insights

  • Sent email to admin and custommer

  • Sent SMS to admin order – Twilio

  • Whether you operate a small restaurant, a busy cafe, or a booming food delivery service, the Gonowo Delivery Elementor Plugin is your all-in-one solution to enhance customer experience, streamline operations, and skyrocket your online presence. Get ready to take your food business to new heights with the Gonowo Delivery Elementor
    Plugin

  • And, more over 40 function

üí° WORKS WITH BUILDERS

  • Compatible with Elementor

Layouts
* Menu Page here
* Checkout Page
* Success page
And more …

(Contact to Email contact For check other Deliver theme)

Intro video:

üí° ELEVATE YOUR WEBSITE WITH GONOWO THEME

  • Create unparalleled websites while saving time, money, and resources with Gonowo‚Äôs full website multi-restaurant. Get access to 100+ professional widgets, features, and tools.

  • For documentation and tutorials go to our Documentation
